page.title: 16Grantully Castle Page 2
page.content: The castle is about 35m high including the turrets.It is 5 stories high and the walls are about 2m thick at the bottom.The biggest room in the castle is the drawing room and the biggest room in the oldest part is the Hall. Only three very famous people have stayed in the castle. The first was {General Monk,he}came in 1654.Nobody else famous came to stay till just before the last war when the{Duke and {Duchess of York,our}present{Queen {Mother,came}to stay for two weeks after they got married. Not all the castle is used.There are lots of bedrooms upstairs which are only used when lots of people come,but they try to use most of it to keeo the air fresh. We found Grantully Castle a very interesting building.
